name: NSCC 50/50 Fall Fundraiser in Support of United Way!
blurb:
The Nova Scotia Community College is excited to announce the launch our Fall Online 50/50 Fundraiser in Support of the United Way!

The money raised will help support local families in and around Nova Scotia.

Please help support our fundraiser by purchasing tickets! 

Ticket Sales End: December 3
Draw Date: December 4
Draw Location: Nova Scotia Community College, 5658 Leeds Street, Halifax NS

The winner will be contacted to claim their prize payout.

We thank you for your support!
emailTicketBody: The draw AGD-106132-19 will take place on December 4th at the Nova Scotia Community College, 5658 Leeds Street, Halifax NS. The winner will then be contacted by NSCC to claim their prize! Your ticket numbers are below:
